query:
UPDATE sync_state SET 
                status = 'scanning',
                phase = 'scanning',
                total_items = 0,
                processed_items = 0,
                successful_items = 0,
                failed_items = 0,
                current_item = NULL,
                started_at = datetime('now'),
                completed_at = NULL,
                last_updated_at = datetime('now'),
                error_message = NULL
            WHERE id = 1
